text: g. Leisure, retail, jobs, services, and associated necessary infrastructure will be located to best support local neighbourhoods and to reduce the need for long-distance travel. This will assist local residents in supporting physical activity, active travel, greener streets, and public spaces. h. Flood risk will be mitigated through the use of multi-functional green spaces including sustainable drainage systems, improved flood defences, and innovative water management methods. VISION AND OBJECTIVESINTRODUCTION 10.7 Healthy, safe and inclusive neighbourhoods: a. People of all ages, background, and abilities will be provided with an environment that encourages and enables active and healthy lifestyles. Social interaction and accessibility will be promoted in buildings, streets, and spaces to create high-quality places that are valued, enjoyed, and feel safe for all.
